Check for new replies or respond here...

Subject: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: nina

I remember Kirk Cameron being the biggest heartthrob on tv, then he married his onscreen girlfriend and started making weird demands on the show, eating Atkins and made those Left Behind movies. It also seemed so strange. ::)

Subject: Re: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: Webstor

He married his onscreen girlfriend Chelsea Noble.......then he got pretty conservative as far as his religious beliefs go.

We have a religion-type channel on our cable system and every once in a while I see that Kirk Cameron show is on there....and he is speaking openly about his religious beliefs and its almost like he's preaching to people.

Kinda weird....

Subject: Re: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: lizjagger

Yes, he's very christian. I had such a crush on him during the 80s and early 90s.

Subject: Re: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: Mushroom

He has been a driving force behind the movies based on the book series "Left Behind". Both his wife and himself are involved, and they have released 3 movies so far. The most recent is Left Behind: World At War, and features Louis Gossett Jr. playing the President of the United States.

Subject: Re: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: Donnie Darko

Don't care. I like his sister Candace. :-*

Subject: Re: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: Tom Cruise is a Dork

Very religious and reminds me of other very religious celebs like Tom Cruise, though he's a scientologist ...

Subject: Re: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: Chris MegatronTHX

I remember Kirk Cameron's status as a teen idol was already on the skids by 1989, and something of a has been by 1990. I say that because I distinctly remember him hosting a Back to the Future special in 1990 and thinking, "hey why'd they pull this guy out of the mothballs?".

Kirk Cameron's peak year of popularity was 1987. Back during 1986-'88 this guy was considered the sh*t by all the girls at my school. They wouldn't shut up about him. From what I heard, he started acting like a real nutball on the waning years of Growing Pains, saying that everything on the show was a sin against God, which likely contributed to his decline in popularity...even before the 80s were over.

Subject: Re: Whatever happend to Kirk Cameron?

Written By: stingr22

Yes, as stated here, Kirk Cameron is a devout Christian. So many people treat that as if it's a bad word. I was never a fan of his growing up. Now I respect him for being vocal about what he believes. He doesn't try to beat you on the head with a Bible, but does share his faith if you're interested in hearing about it. This is how all people of faith should be. You can have a belief without trying to beat others up with it. OK, enough of the soapbox! 8)

Anyway, if you want to see what Kirk's up to these days, check out his website: http://www.wayofthemaster.com/
